contest1_home_sub: Unleash Your Inner Vocal Star, Participate, Earn Public Votes, and Win a Reward of 5000 Euros, public voting will start from 1st March 2024.
wiv_content: Vibrer is your ultimate destination for a musical journey like no other. It's a dynamic platform that seamlessly blends the world of music and social interaction. With Vibrer, you can explore diverse genres, connect with talented artists, enjoy live performances, and even participate in contests. Elevate your passion for music and engage with a vibrant community of music enthusiasts. Discover, connect, and experience music on a whole new level with Vibrer.
wvf_sub: Built Exclusively for Music Industry Artists
wvf_desc: Vibrer is a platform crafted for music enthusiasts and creators alike. Whether you're an aspiring singer, a talented musician, or a passionate dancer, Vibrer provides a space to showcase your artistry, connect with fans, and unlock opportunities. Our vibrant community offers a hub for discovering new talents, enjoying live performances, and engaging with your favorite artists. Whether you're seeking inspiration or aiming to amplify your musical journey, Vibrer empowers you to express and experience the magic of music like never before.
elevate_mj: Elevate your music experience with Vibrer's cutting-edge tools.
dynamic_sm_desc: Craft a dynamic social media-inspired profile that not only showcases your artistic essence but also connects you with fans. This feature empowers you to thrive in the music community, creating an immersive experience that goes beyond mere functionality.
shareYourPassionDesc: Amplify your presence by effortlessly sharing your music, videos, and creations with a global audience. Connect, inspire, and grow through vibrant content sharing on Vibrer.
browseAndConnectDesc: Explore a world of diverse musical talents and connect with like-minded enthusiasts. Discover new genres, follow your favorite artists, and build a vibrant community on Vibrer.
seamlessCommunicationDesc: Engage in lively discussions, express your thoughts, and connect with artists and fans using Vibrer's intuitive inbuilt chat system.
exclusiveLiveConcertsDesc: Immerse yourself in extraordinary live performances by celebrated artists, available exclusively on Vibrer. Experience the energy of live music from the convenience of your device.
onlineContestsDesc: Participate in online contests on Vibrer. Step up to the challenge by participating in singing contests, dance-offs, and more, Showcase your artistry, secure votes, and win prizes on Vibrer.
liveStreamingDesc: Feel the beat in real-time with Vibrer's Live Streaming. Artists go live, fans connect, and virtual gifts flow, all at your fingertips.
subscribeSub: Stay informed about Vibrer's upcoming launch by providing your details. Join us on this musical adventure!
subscribeFormConsent: By submitting this form, you agree to receive updates and notifications from Vibrer. We respect your privacy and won't share your information with third parties.
socialHubDescription: Elevate your experience with Vibrer's integrated Social Hub feature. Enhance your presence and empower creators to flourish within a vibrant artistic community.
socialHubFeature1: Fans engage with music, videos, live streams, concerts, contests through likes, comments, playlist, bookmarks etc.
socialHubFeature2: Artists can captivate their audience with Music, images, videos, polls and earn a passive income
socialHubClosing: Join Vibrer's interconnected community, where music enthusiasts and creators unite to celebrate their passion and connect like never before.
walletTitleStatic: Earn and manage funds through inbuilt wallet
walletDescriptionStatic: Earn a passive income on Vibrer by sharing music videos and audio files, participating in contests, performing live concerts, offering one-to-one performances, and live streaming. Monetize your content and build a stronger relationship with your audience.
footerDescription: Join Vibrer's vibrant community to explore, connect, and share your love for music. Unveil a world of melodies and connections.
footerStayInformed: Stay informed about Vibrer's upcoming launch by providing your details.
copyright: Â© {year} All rights reserved | Vibrer Internet Content Provider L.L.C, UAE

delete_confirmation: are you sure you want to delete this?

privacyLangNotice: Privacy policy is only available in English.
termsLangNotice: Terms & conditions are only available in English.
cookieLangNotice: Cookie settings page is only available in English.
login_page_text: Vibrer has everything you need to take your love for music to the next level.
password_must_be_at_least: Password must be at least 6 characters long
signup_page_text: Welcome to Vibrer, the ultimate music platform for talented artists and passionate fans!
signup_agreement: By signing up, I agree to the Privacy Policy and T&C.
rs_description: You have successfully registered, a verification email will be sent to you shortly. If you do not receive it, please check your spam folder.
rs_highlight_message: In 15 seconds, you will be automatically redirected to complete your profile.
forgot_pass_text: Vibrer is your one-stop destination for all things music, So what are you waiting for?
forgot_pass_sub: To reset your password, please enter your registered email address. We'll send a link to that email where you can reset your password securely.
email_user_doesnt_exist: User with this Email does not exist
fp_email_sent: An Email with password reset link has been sent to your email address

set_new_pass_sub: You're almost there! Please enter your new password below. Make sure your password is strong and secure to protect your account.

pass_confirmpass_failed: Password and Confirm Password do not match
email_verified_sub: Thank you for verifying your email address.
redirectMessage: If you are not automatically redirected to the login page within 15 seconds, please click the login button below to access your account.
full_name_notice: Your full name will be publicly visible as your profile name.
cover_image_helper: To optimally fit, use an image of 800x300 pixels.
contest_1_term_desc: Join the stage and let your voice echo through the halls of Vibrer! It's time to ignite your passion for singing in the inaugural chapter of our Vibrer Vocal Challenge. Whether you're a seasoned vocalist or just love to sing in the shower, this is your moment to shine.
contest_1_term_desc1: Participating in the Vibrer Vocal Challenge is a breeze. Here's your simple roadmap to stardom:
contest_1_step_title: It's that simple! Vibrer provides the stage, and you provide the magic. Join now and let your voice be heard.
constest_1_step1: Create Your Account: Begin your journey by signing up on Vibrer. It takes just a few clicks to get started.
constest_1_step2: Choose Your Contest: Navigate to the Vibrer Vocal Challenge: Chapter 1 contest and click "Participate." It's your time to shine!
constest_1_step3: Showcase Your Talent: Upload your mesmerizing music or vocal video. Pour your heart into your performance, and let your unique style shine.
constest_1_step4: Captivate the Vibrer Audience: Your fellow Vibrer users become the judges! They'll watch, listen, and cast their votes for their favorite performances.
constest_1_step5: Seize Stardom: When the contest concludes, the one with the most votes will be crowned the Vibrer Vocal Champion of Chapter
contest_1_first_prize_text: A whopping $5000 in cold, hard cash. Certificate of winning, A gift hamper loaded with treasures
contest_1_second_prize_text: $2000 in cash to make your dreams sparkle. Certificate of winning, A gift hamper brimming with delights
contest_1_third_prize_text: $1000 in cash to celebrate your talents. Certificate of winning, A gift hamper filled with surprises
contest_1_opportunity_1: Collaborate and create music projects with Vibrer.
contest_1_opportunity_2: Get your talents showcased through our vibrant social media channels.
contest_1_opportunity_3: Open doors to exciting music ventures and experiences.
contest_1_opportunity_4: It's more than a contest; it's a gateway to a world of possibilities. Are you ready to claim your victory?
contest_1_terms_title: Vibrer Vocal Challenge - Terms and Conditions
contest_1_eligibility_1: The Vibrer Singing Contest ("Contest") is open to participants worldwide.
contest_1_eligibility_2: Participants must be at least 16 years old or the age of majority in their respective countries to enter the Contest.
contest_1_contest_period_1: The Contest will commence on 15.01.2024 and end on 01.05.2024
contest_1_how_to_enter_1: Participants must create an account on Vibrer (if they haven't already) to enter the Contest.
contest_1_how_to_enter_2:
Once registered, participants can submit their entry, upload a singing video to the Vibrer Singing Contest platform during the Contest period.
Vocal videos must:
- Have a minimum duration of 90 seconds and a maximum duration of 5 minutes.
- Be the original work of the participant and must not infringe upon any copyright or intellectual property rights.
contest_1_how_to_enter_3: Participants are allowed to submit only one entry.
contest_1_how_to_enter_4: Entries that are incomplete, exceed the specified duration, or do not adhere to the rules or specifications may be disqualified and Vibrer has full rights to remove the entry
contest_1_how_to_enter_5: Screen recording videos are not accepted.
contest_1_how_to_enter_6: The participant holds full responsibility for the copyrights if he/she uploads a cover song.
contest_1_voting_1: Voting will be open to the Vibrer audience during the Contest period.
contest_1_voting_2: Each registered user of Vibrer will be allowed to cast one vote per contest.
contest_1_voting_3: The entry with the highest number of votes at the end of the Contest period will be declared the winner.
contest_1_prizes_1:
The Contest prizes are as follows:
- 1st Place: $5000 Cash and a Gift Hamper.
- 2nd Place: $2000 Cash and a Gift Hamper.
- 3rd Place: $1000 Cash and a Gift Hamper.
contest_1_prizes_2: Winners will also have the opportunity to collaborate with Vibrer on music projects, receive promotion through Vibrer's social media channels, and explore exciting music ventures.
contest_1_winner_notification_1: Vibrer App: The names and profiles of the winners will be displayed on the Vibrer app.
contest_1_winner_notification_2: Social Media Channels: The winners will be featured on Vibrer's official social media channels.
contest_1_winner_notification_3: Email Notification: Winners will be notified via the email address associated with their Vibrer account.
contest_1_winner_notification_4: Winners must respond to the notification email within 4 days to claim their prizes.
contest_1_winner_notification_5: Failure to respond within the specified time period may result in disqualification and the selection of an alternate winner.
contest_1_terms_conditions_1: Vibrer reserves the right to disqualify any participant who violates these terms and conditions or attempts to tamper with the Contest process.
contest_1_terms_conditions_2: Vibrer reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the Contest at any time without notice.
contest_1_terms_conditions_3: By participating in the Contest, participants agree to allow Vibrer to use their name, likeness, and entry for promotional purposes.
contest_1_terms_conditions_4: This Contest is subject to all applicable laws and regulations and is void where prohibited.
contest_1_terms_conditions_5: By entering the Vibrer Singing Contest, participants agree to abide by these terms and conditions.
voting_notice: Voting will start from 1<sup>st</sup> March 2024 00:00 AM (CEST).
contest_entry_title: Enter the Vibrer Singing Contest Now!
submit_entry_sub: Enter the title of your song, upload your video, and make sure to read the Terms and Conditions before submitting.
entry_video_max_size: Upload your singing video (maximum upload size is 2 GB).

valid_video: Please choose a valid video file (MP4, WebM, avi, mov, mkv, flv)
file_exc_2gb: File size exceeds the maximum limit of 2 GB.
no_preview_video: Preview not available for this video format. For a better experience, please upload an MP4 video.
